REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0768 reute u f BC-NORWAY'S-RS-BANK-ISSU 06-01 0070

TEXT.TITLE: NORWAY'S RS BANK ISSUES 40 MLN SWISS FRANC BOND
TEXT.BODY: RS Bank Sparebanken Rogaland of Stavanger, Norway is launching a 40 mln Swiss franc seven year bond with a 4-7/8 pct coupon and par issue price, lead manager Banque Gutzwiller, Kurz, Bungener Ltd said. Subscription is from June 11 until June 17 with closing and pay-out on July 7. It can be called at 101 in 1992, and at 100-1/2 in 1993. REUTER
